summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing travel arrangements and staffing needs. Epstein suggests that Staley should schedule world travel and hire additional staff to assist with preparations.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is mentioned as a recipient of an email from Jeffrey Epstein, discussing travel and staffing.

persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, advising Staley on travel arrangements and staffing.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein advises Jes Staley to schedule world travel and hire more staff.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
